LanguageData.Mousekin_Leather_Mousekin.label: Mousekin fur
LanguageData.Mousekin_Leather_Mousekin.description: The soft, furry and snowy white pelt of a Mousekin. While most humanoids regard this as just another type of fur, Mousekins find this material to be utterly horrifying.
LanguageData.Mousekin_LeatherGiantCavy.label: giant cavy fur
LanguageData.Mousekin_LeatherGiantCavy.description: The soft, furry pelt of a giant cavy, more durable and luxurious than regular guinea pig fur, while retaining the unique cuteness of the oversized rodent it originated from. Good at temperature regulation in hot climates.
LanguageData.Mousekin_LeatherPudgemouse.label: pudgemouse fur
LanguageData.Mousekin_LeatherPudgemouse.description: Sheets of soft, grey Pudgemouse fur. It is delicate and luxurious, but not particularly insulating. Most Mousekins consider Pudgemice to be sentient companions, and will be disturbed if they see apparel made with this material.
